metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31616 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a localuser with basic capabilities can cause an out-of-bounds read, which maylead to denial of service, or information disclosure.
